problem_text_cn: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1}、l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．已知AB=1,BC=3,DE=2,则EF的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l_{N_0}、l_{N_1} and these three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C and points D, E, and F respectively. Knowing that AB=N_2,BC=N_3,DE=N_4, then the length of EF is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查平行线分线段成比例的性质,掌握平行线分线段可得对应线段成比例是解题的关键．
